job_details.Functieomschrijving: As a Senior JVM Polyglot Software Engineer, I will entrust you with complex, long-term software projects close to home. You will work with emotionally intelligent, experienced teammates to address challenges that impact millions of users. From intake and architecture to delivery and knowledge transfer, you will be part of every stage of the software lifecycle, improving not just systems but also the engineering culture of client organizations. Your ability to inspire, communicate effectively, and bring people together will be critical, alongside your technical skills. Embracing a polyglot mindset, you will use tools like Java, Kotlin, Scala, TypeScript, and Go to solve problems. You will have opportunities to experiment with cutting-edge technologies in areas such as generative AI, event sourcing, and microservices, ensuring that your work remains impactful, innovative, and fulfilling.
job_details.full_text:
Senior JVM Polyglot Software Engineer

As a Senior JVM Polyglot Software Engineer, I will entrust you with complex, long-term software projects close to home. You will work with emotionally intelligent, experienced teammates to address challenges that impact millions of users. From intake and architecture to delivery and knowledge transfer, you will be part of every stage of the software lifecycle, improving not just systems but also the engineering culture of client organizations. Your ability to inspire, communicate effectively, and bring people together will be critical, alongside your technical skills. Embracing a polyglot mindset, you will use tools like Java, Kotlin, Scala, TypeScript, and Go to solve problems. You will have opportunities to experiment with cutting-edge technologies in areas such as generative AI, event sourcing, and microservices, ensuring that your work remains impactful, innovative, and fulfilling.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software engineering principles, polyglot programming with JVM languages, and general software lifecycle involvement. While it mentions 'generative AI' as an area for experimentation, it does not indicate a primary focus on developing, fine-tuning, or deploying generative AI models or systems. The core responsibilities and technologies listed align more with a general software engineering role rather than a specialized ML or GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes 'complex, long-term software projects', 'every stage of the software lifecycle, improving not just systems but also the engineering culture', and 'architecture to delivery'. This points to core software development responsibilities.
The phrase 'part of every stage of the software lifecycle' directly indicates involvement in the full software development process.
job_tasks.phrase: part of every stage of the software lifecycle

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'address challenges that impact millions of users' and 'improving not just systems but also the engineering culture of client organizations' suggests a need to understand business impact and client needs.
job_tasks.phrase: address challenges that impact millions of users

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'improving not just systems but also the engineering culture of client organizations' implies understanding and addressing broader organizational and business needs beyond just technical implementation.
job_tasks.phrase: improving not just systems but also the engineering culture of client organizations
